title: 실리콘밸리 슈퍼스타트업 한국 오피스 Product Manager (Messaging Platform)
content:
주요 업무
        Drive messaging product from setting the vision, delivering the product, and bringing it to marketDesign simple, intuitive API to solve complex architectural problemsDefine the product and customer experience with business requirements and user stories and manage the scope of each product launch to deliver on timeUnderstand and analyze user needs for messaging in their applicationsAnalyze market trends, competitors, customer research, and product data to drive the overall success of the productPartner with designers to create an intuitive and beautiful user experienceWork with engineers to build and launch new featuresHelp evangelize product vision through presentations to stakeholders

업무 관련 기술 / 활동 분야
        
          product-management
          API
          Agile Scrum
          Agile Product Management

채용 상세
        자격요건5+ years of product management experienceExperience collaborating with large cross-functional teamsStrong execution and ability to drive work to completionAbility to drive, contribute to, and communicate solutions to technical product challengesDemonstrated success in creating innovative and user-friendly software products
